name: Neko Cosmo Police (itch)
description:
This twin stick shooter is about Neko fighting with their all cost. In 2565 UC. the Cosmos has been altered by MadBotz gang. The last hope is rely on the Neko Cosmo Police team, "Kuro" and "Shiro"

They say "Twin stick shooter is easy to play, hard to master"

Features

  • Arcade style Twin stick shooter
  • Weapons upgrade, Laser, Bomb
  • Many MadBotz to fight
  • Boss Parade
  • Online Leaderboards
